comment.author: 32402012@N05
comment._content: The road across the foreground is Horsepen, and the neighborhood is the one where the streets are named for institutions of higher education, such as Wake Forest, Vanderbilt, Dartmouth, Harvard, etc. In the background is Broad St Rd.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: The neighborhood was called Crestview. The vast majority of the houses and apartments in the picture have been demolished and replaced with a newer development. The area is roughly bordered by Glenside, Horesepen, and Broad Street Road.

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: This is before the Reynolds Metals complex was built (now occupied by Phillip Morris)  The Reynolds Metals headquarters was built in the wooded area behind the neighborhood
